tasks.instructions: You should spend about 20 minutes on this task
tasks.description: The Pie chart gives information about the country of birth of people living in Australia and the table shows where people born in these countries live.

images.altText: Pie chart showing country of birth of people in Australia
Table showing where people born in these countries live

tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: People think that countries should produce foods their population eats and import less food as much as possible. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
